ing: 1 1/2 fluid ounces tonic water, or more to taste
des: "Pick a few sprigs of lavender from your garden to add a refreshing, slightly astringent element to a basic vodka tonic. The delicate lavender sprigs look lovely in the glass along with a slice of fresh lemon."
ins:
Put lavender sprigs in cocktail glass; add vodka. Refrigerate vodka mixture until lavender is infused into vodka, about 10 minutes.
Squeeze lemon over vodka; add ice cubes and tonic water.
